column5: Learn how to improve organisational performance and productivity by applying psychological theories and principles to the work environment. Accredited by the British Psychological Society (BPS).On our Occupational Psychology MSc you’ll learn how to apply psychological theories and principles to the work environment to improve employee satisfaction and wellbeing, as well as performance and productivity. You can apply these skills as a consultant to businesses or members of staff.
column7: Home (2022 annual fee) : £13,000  Overseas (2022 annual fee) : £27,500
